# Smithy (Building)
## Overview
**Smithy**

**Create** 18 Goods, 1 Influence, 17 Labor (730 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Forge (Room)|Forge]], 1 [[Office (Room)|Office]], 2 [[Storage (Room)|Storages]]

An armorsmith, blacksmith, or weaponsmith.
